roles.name: Ambusher
roles.description: Creatures that utilize surprise and stealth.

roles.name: Artillery
roles.description: Creatures that fight best from afar, use ranged attacks.

roles.name: Brute
roles.description: Hardy creatures with lots of hp and/or armor/barrier.

roles.name: Controller
roles.description: Creatures who rely on crowd control to debuff, move and obstruct enemies.

roles.name: Leader
roles.description: Creatures whose power can come from directing, buffing, or summoning underlings.

roles.name: Skirmisher
roles.description: Creatures who are mobile and make the most of good positioning.

roles.name: Solo
roles.description: Action-oriented creatures who can take on multiple PCs by themselves.

roles.name: Soldier
roles.description: Creatures who are the standard rank-and-file.

roles.name: Support
roles.description: Creatures who aid their allies through buffs, healing, movement, etc.
